00021 #ifndef CO_DISPATCHER_H
00022 #define CO_DISPATCHER_H
00023

00025 #include <co/commandFunc.h> // used inline
00026 #include <co/types.h>

00028 namespace co
00029 {
00030 namespace detail { class Dispatcher; }
00031 
00038     class Dispatcher
00039     {
00040     public:
00042         typedef CommandFunc< Dispatcher > Func;
00043 
00045         Dispatcher& operator = ( const Dispatcher& ) { return *this; }
00046 
00059         template< typename T > void
00060         registerCommand( const uint32_t command, const CommandFunc< T >& func,
00061                          CommandQueue* queue );
00062 
00071         CO_API virtual bool dispatchCommand( ICommand& command );
00072 
00073     protected:
00074         CO_API Dispatcher();
00075         CO_API Dispatcher( const Dispatcher& from );
00076         CO_API virtual ~Dispatcher();
00077 
00084         CO_API bool _cmdUnknown( ICommand& command );
00085 
00086     private:
00087         detail::Dispatcher* const _impl;
00088 
00089         CO_API void _registerCommand( const uint32_t command,
00090                                       const Func& func, CommandQueue* queue );
00091     };
00092 
00093     template< typename T >
00094     void Dispatcher::registerCommand( const uint32_t command,
00095                                       const CommandFunc< T >& func,
00096                                       CommandQueue* queue )
00097     {
00098         _registerCommand( command, Dispatcher::Func( func ), queue );
00099     }
00100 }
